title: Lamb cutlets spiced with fennel (shahi chaap amber)
description: This popular mutton chop recipe is made with lamb cutlets, first simmered in aromatic milk before being covered in a light spice batter and fried.
ingredients: 12 green cardamom pods, lightly bruised with a rolling pin
1kg/2lb 4oz lamb cutlets (from a rack of lamb)
2 tsp fennel seeds, toasted and ground
1 tsp ground cardamom (seeds from 30 green pods)
3 green chillies, finely chopped, with seeds
